alert.note: Alert for Ashland; Holmes; Wayne (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 12 at 5:55PM EDT until August 12 at 6:15PM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 615 PM EDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN ASHLAND...WAYNE AND HOLMES COUNTIES... At 554 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Rittman to Wooster to near Loudonville, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. Locations impacted include... Wooster, Millersburg, Orrville, Berlin, Rittman, Walnut Creek, Doylestown, Loudonville, Creston, Dalton, Shreve, Killbuck, Holmesville, Glenmont, Mount Eaton, Nashville, Winesburg, Farmerstown, Smithville and Apple Creek. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EDT for north central and northeastern Ohio. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
